title: Statsum Token Response
description: Token for submitting statistics to statsum.

project.title: Project
project.description: Project name that the token grants access to.

token.title: Access Token
token.description: JWT token to be used as `Bearer <token>` when submitting data to statsum.

expires.title: Token Expiration
expires.description: Time at which the token expires and should not be used anymore.

baseUrl.title: BaseUrl
baseUrl.description: Base URL for the statsum server this project is allocated on.
